desmoj.extensions.applicationDomains.harbour

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.simulator.NamedObject
      • desmoj.core.simulator.ModelComponent
        • desmoj.core.simulator.Reportable
          • desmoj.extensions.applicationDomains.harbour.Block
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Yard

    public class Block
extends Reportable
    Block is the place where containers (or other kind of goods) can be stored by transpoters or cranes and retrieved by transporters or cranes. The storing is possible using store() of the Block. With the retrieve() a container can be retrieved from the Block. A Block is a part of the container Yard. There are no queues for processes want to store or retrieve one container. If no or not enough containers are available to retrieve, the tries to do that will be refused. The Block has a certain capacity that measures in TEUs. So a 20-foot-container weigths one TEU and 40-foot-container 2 TEUs. If the Block is filled to it's capacity the tries to store a container there will be refused. Yard is part of the composite design pattern as described in [Gamm97] page 163 in which it represents the the component class. Block is derived from Reportable, which provides the report functionality for the Block.
    See Also:
    Reportable

      The number of TEUs that are aready occupied and are avalaible for the retrieving.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        public Block(Model owner,
             java.lang.String name,
             int typ,
             long capacity,
             boolean showInReport,
             boolean showInTrace)
        Constructor for a Block of a certain typ with a certain capacity.
        Parameters:
        owner - desmoj.Model : The model this Block is associated to.
        name - java.lang.String : The Block's name.
        typ - int : The Block's type. It can be only 0 - for export containers, 1- for import containers or 2 - mixed: for import and export containers.
        capacity - long : The maximum capacity (TEU) of this Block.
        showInReport - boolean : Flag, if this Block should produce a report or not.
        showInTrace - boolean : Flag for trace to produce trace messages.

             java.lang.String name,
             int typ,
             long capacity,
             long init,

        Constructor for a Block with an initial number of TEUs and a certain capacity.

        typ - int : The Block's type. It can be only 0 - for export containers, 1- for import containers or 2 - mixed: for import and export containers.
        capacity - long : The maximum capacity of this Block.
        init - long : The initial occupied capacity of the Block starts with. Must be positive!
        showInReport - boolean : Flag, if this Block should produce a report or not.
        showInTrace - boolean : Flag for trace to produce trace messages.

        ctyp - int : The container type of this Block. It can be only 0- for empty, 1- for normal, 2- for reefer, 4- for overlarge, 5- for danger containers.

        showInReport - boolean : Flag, if this Block should produce a report or not.
        showInTrace - boolean : Flag for trace to produce trace messages.

      • store

        public boolean store(long n)
        Method for producers to make the Block store a number of n TEUs (a container). When the capacity of the block can not hold the additional incoming TEUs the try to store will be refused.
        Parameters:
        n - long : The weight of the container to be stored in this Block. n must be positive.
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true if the container can been stored successfully, false otherwise.

        public boolean retrieve(long n)
        Method for consumers to make the Block retrieve a number of n TEUs (a container). When the block is empty the try to retrieve will be refused.
        Parameters:
        n - long : The weight of the container to be stored in this Block. n must be positive.
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true if the container can been stored successfully, false otherwise.

      • plan

        public boolean plan(long n)
        Method for consumers to make the Block plan a number of n TEUs (a place for a container) to be retrieved there later. When all the containers are already planed for the later retrieving the try to plan will be refused.
        Parameters:
        n - long : The number of TEUs that a container that is in the Block weights. n must be positive.
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true if a container can been planed successfully, false otherwise.

      • getInitial

        Gets the initial number of TEUs the Block starts with.
        Returns:
        long : The initial number of TEUs the Block starts with.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        To reset the statistics of this Block. The current capacity and the number of avalaible TEUs for the storing and retrieving, reserving and planing are not changed. But all statistic counters are reset. The Reportable is also reset.
        Overrides:
        reset in class Reportable

      • isFree

        public boolean isFree(long n)
        Method to check if the Block is free (it can be stored there) for at least some TEUs.
        Parameters:
        n - long : The number of TEUs that are at least must be avalaible (free).
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true if the Block is free, false otherwise.

      • reserve

        public boolean reserve(long n)
        Method for producers to make the Block reserve a number of n TEUs (a place for a container) to be stored there later. When the whole available capacity is already reserved the try to reserve will be refused.
        Parameters:
        n - long : The number of TEUs that are needed for a container to be stored in the Block. n must be positive.
        Returns:
        boolean : Is true if a place for a container can been reserved successfully, false otherwise.
